http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu.http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu: Enter the name of the Badge you want to create.

SELECT ?s ?name { ?user a kds:UserClass . ?user kds:hasPerson ?s . ?s schema:givenName ?givenName . ?s schema:familyName ?familyName . ?s schema:email ?email . BIND (CONCAT(?familyName,'-',?givenName,'-',?email) AS ?name) . } ORDER BY ?name

https://w3id.org/openbadges#AssertionFor.http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com: Use this form for generating a badge assertion.

http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu.http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com: Badge used for the badge assertion.

Enter the date that the badge was awarded.
Please select or enter a new recipient.
SELECT * { ?s a schema:Person . ?s schema:familyName ?familyName . ?s schema:givenName ?givenName . BIND (CONCAT(?familyName,', ',?givenName) AS ?name) } ORDER BY ?name
